ModMetaData.name: RuntimeGC [1.4]
ModMetaData.author: user19990313, Trinity
ModMetaData.description:
Fixed version of the 1.4 fork
<size=20>RuntimeGC In-Game Cleaner</size>
Thanks to Trinity for continuing awesome mod from user19990313 ~Proxyer for 1.4 Translation updates.
Original Repository: https://github.com/user19990313/RimWorld-RuntimeGC
- Remove unnecessary World Pawns to alleviate burden of GameSystem - Clear AvoidGrids to reduce the size of your savegame - Remove useless members(dead or of other factions) in an animal family - Remove filth in HomeArea, and snow - Remove corpses in current map - Remove BattleLog entries - Fix some faction relationships error(Those caused by mod conflicts are not included!) - Re-generate faction leaders to fix some CommTable issues. - Reclaim Memory used by GameSystem to boost game performance
You can find the original mod description on the steam workshop page.
Latest updates: - Updated to 1.4. - Removed storytellerfix and button as it's no longer needed. - Removed support for 1.0, 1.1 and 1.2, the older mods do their job just fine. - Fixed the dev options appearing on the float menu when dev isn't enabled as it's intended purpose. - Tidied About.xml file.
